stories.text: I was pondering the reported ineffectiveness of Russia’s military, so I did a quick search on alcoholism across the world.  According to World Population Review, roughly 37% of Russia’s male population are alcoholics.  For those that have served, is alcohol dependency a plausible explanation for Russia’s military issues?
stories.title: Ask HN: Russian Military and Alcohol?
Comparing the Network Behavior of Popular Browsers on First-Run

stories.text:
I am tired of vaguely remembering something cool I came across before and not being able to find it. Manual bookmarking like upnext/readitlater are too slow for my desired workflow - I want literally everything I have ever read to be indexed, on desktop, ipad or iphone. Nice to have - also index what I watch and listen to.

I remember that some folks have some kind of pihole thing that snoops the router and scrapes all text to make it searchable but don't really know how to do it. I'm down for that as long as we can keep privacy for each tenant (this is negotiable). Are there any other alternatives?
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you keep track of everything you have read/watched/listened?
Exposure of fake Chinese tube amplifier
New discovery about distant galaxies: Stars are heavier than we thought
